thread.title: Qatar- QTA aims for 3mn-visitor mark
thread.title_full: Qatar- QTA aims for 3mn-visitor mark | MENAFN.COM

author: Gulf Times
title: Qatar- QTA aims for 3mn-visitor mark
text: (MENAFN - Gulf Times) Qatar Tourism Authority (QTA) chairman Issa bin Mohamed al-Mohannadi yesterday urged stakeholders and partners to step up efforts to boost inward bound tourism and help the authority to pass the mark of 3mn visitors by 2015 end. Speaking at the second annual Tourism Industry Ghabga, al-Mohannadi said: "With the support of upcoming festivals and events Qatar is on track to pass the 3mn-visitor mark by the end of 2015." Ambassadors of the US, Belgium and South Africa, tourism industry leaders from many countries and partners attended the annual Ghabga held at the St Regis in Doha.
